approved(uint256).details: this event is emitted when a campaign gets approve by the admin

campaignCreated(uint256,bytes32,bytes32,.details: This event is emitted when a crowdfunding campaign is made.

params._companyName: name of the company going to create the campaign
params._pricePerToken: price per token for eg : 10 NEO tokens == 100INR( here 1 neo is equal to 10 INR)
params._tokenName: Name of the token launched by the user
params._tokenSymbol: symbol of the token launched by the user
params.deadLine: End date for the campaign to contribute,

contribution(uint256,uint256,address).details: this event will emit when the contribution was maded by the users

params.contribution: amount of the contribution by the user

refunded(uint256,uint256,address).details: This event will emit when refund is made

params.contribution: amount of the contribution by the user

rejected(uint256).details: this event is emitted when a campaign gets reject by the admin
